page.title: 15RASHFIELD SCHOOL.
page.content: Rashfield school is a primary school for children age 5 to 11.The children are usually divided into primarys 1-3 and primarys 4-7 but this can change according to the numbers in the school each year. School begins at 9.30am to allow the school car to make several journeys to collect children from the various areas. The school has no sports facilities or gymnasium and classrooms had to be cleared for P.E. Now the children are taken to a gymnasium in Sandbank each week. They also visit the swimming pool each week for one term. A visiting music instructor comes weekly to instruct some pupils to play wind instruments. The school also has recorder groups.
